turns.user_message: Hi there! I need help resetting my password urgently.
turns.assistant_message: Hello Camila. I can help. Which online service needs a password reset?

turns.user_message: I need help with resetting my Facebook password urgently.
turns.assistant_message: Okay, Camila. Let's reset your Facebook password. Do you have access to the email or phone number linked to your account?

hidden_states.inner_thoughts: I should quickly mention the service I need help with to move forward.

turns.user_message: Yes, I have access to my linked email. What should I do next?
turns.assistant_message: Great! Go to the Facebook login page and click "Forgot password?". Enter your email.

hidden_states.inner_thoughts: I'm relieved that we're moving forward with the reset. I do have access to my email.

turns.user_message: Okay, I’ll do that right now. What’s the next step after entering my email?
turns.assistant_message: Facebook will send a code to your email. Check your inbox and enter the code on the Facebook page.

user_profile.name: Camila Torres
user_profile.description: Camila is a 22-year-old novice in technology, navigating the professional environment of an office with limited mobility. She approaches tasks, like resetting a password, with a friendly demeanor and an adaptable mindset, though her very reserved expressiveness and indirect communication style sometimes make it challenging to articulate her needs. Despite her impatience with lengthy processes, her extensive previous experience lends her the confidence to tackle this task swiftly, driven by a sense of urgency to maintain her access to essential work tools.

instructions.dialogue: Share some key information but keep some details private.
instructions.profile: Share most of your profile information when asked.
instructions.hidden_state: Express clear emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Resetting a forgotten password in a work environment
additional_requirements: Clear visual prompts for each step
